name: Luck and Key
description:
Luck and Key is an adventure and fantasy visual novel with puzzle-solving elements and choice-driven endings.

When Ulrich "Ridge" Luchesse, the only son and heir to the Marquess of Parzden is pulled into the threads of a family tapestry, he finds himself wandering through memories of his childhood days, meeting friends of old and relatives who have long since passed. Which of his visions are unfamiliar? Can he stitch up the blanks and find a way out with the connections he's made?

Demo Version 1.0 - Uploaded (Contains 1x 10-min scene.)
